title: AgentDVR LXC
textContent:
AgentDVR LXC 
                AgentDVR a new
                    video
                    surveillance solution for the Internet Of Things.
                To create a new Proxmox VE AgentDVR LXC, run the command below in the Proxmox VE Shell. 
                
                Copybash -c "$(wget -qLO - https://github.com/community-scripts/ProxmoxVE/raw/main/ct/agentdvr.sh)"
                ⚡ Default Settings: 2GB RAM - 8GB Storage - 2vCPU - Privileged ⚡
                AgentDVR Interface: IP:8090
outerHTML:
AgentDVR LXC

AgentDVR a new video surveillance solution for the Internet Of Things.

To create a new Proxmox VE AgentDVR LXC, run the command below in the Proxmox VE Shell. 

bash -c "$(wget -qLO - https://github.com/community-scripts/ProxmoxVE/raw/main/ct/agentdvr.sh)"

⚡ Default Settings: 2GB RAM - 8GB Storage - 2vCPU - Privileged ⚡

AgentDVR Interface: IP:8090
